name: Two out of Three Trivia Game | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Question: RIDE, ANNOUNCE, COUNT.
Answer: INTRODUCE - an anagram of the letters RIDE and COUNT to make a word that means ANNOUNCE.
Now it's your turn ...


HAPPY, LURE, CHEF.
questions.explanation:
Cheerful.

	LURE plus CHEF anagram to make CHEERFUL, a synonym for HAPPY.

Question.

	QUIET plus SON anagram to make QUESTION, a synonym for ASK.

Wildebeest.

	BELTED plus WISE anagram to make WILDEBEEST, a synonym for GNU.

Heartless.

	LETS plus SHARE anagram to make HEARTLESS, a synonym for CRUEL.

Occupation.

	INPUT plus COCOA anagram to make OCCUPATION, a synonym for JOB.

Dangerous.

	USED plus GROAN anagram to make DANGEROUS, a synonym for RISKY.

Incinerate.

	RETAIN plus NICE anagram to make INCINERATE, a synonym for BURN.

Adversary.

	RAVES plus YARD anagram to make ADVERSARY, a synonym for FOE.

Produce.

	DROP plus CUE anagram to make PRODUCE, a synonym for MAKE.

Creature.

	TRUE plus CARE anagram to make CREATURE, a synonym for ANIMAL.
